name: Photostory Deluxe Project
summary: Learn about .MPH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Photostory Deluxe allows users to create customized slideshows by importing pictures, audio, and video clips from a camera or computer. The MPH format is the default file type for organizing all the content you import.

When editing an MPH project with Photostory Deluxe, you can edit imported images and add transitions, tiles, and other effects to the included images, audio, and video. Then, after editing your project, you can export it to various formats, upload it to the Internet, or burn it to a DVD.

description: An MPH file is a project created by MAGIX Photostory Deluxe, a Windows application used to create slideshow presentations. It typically contains imported images, video, and audio clips organized on a timeline and added transitions, effects, and titles. MPH files also store settings for the project, including the aspect ratio and resolution.

instructions: You can open an MPH file with MAGIX Photostory Deluxe in Windows. To open an MPH file, select File → Open.
MAGIX Photostory Deluxe can convert MPH files to various file types (select File → Export), including the following formats:
